issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Hi,

width Studio v4.5.0 I have created a new, empty module project. In header I found deprecated classes like  org.appcelerator.titanium.util.Log and org.appcelerator.titanium.util.TiConfig.

I think it would be better to use the new stuff from org.appcelerator.kroll.common.*

Code strong!

Rainer
fields.summary: Avoid deprecated methods/libs while generating default android module
